summary.span: 提供一組 static (Visual Basic 中是 Shared) 方法，以處理資料流程區塊。

span.span: Provides a set of static (Shared in Visual Basic) methods for working with dataflow blocks.

.method public static hidebysig class System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1<int32> Choose<T1, T2>(class System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock`1<!!T1> source1, class System.Action`1<!!T1> action1, class System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock`1<!!T2> source2, class System.Action`1<!!T2> action2) cil managed
Public Function Choose(Of T1, T2) (source1 As ISourceBlock(Of T1), action1 As Action(Of T1), source2 As ISourceBlock(Of T2), action2 As Action(Of T2)) As Task(Of Integer)

typeparam.name: T1
typeparam.span: 指定第一個來源包含的資料型別。

span.span: Specifies type of data contained in the first source.

typeparam.name: T2
typeparam.span: 指定第二個來源包含的資料型別。

span.span: Specifies type of data contained in the second source.

param.name: source1
param.span: 第一個來源。

span.span: The first source.

param.name: action1
param.span: 要對第一個來源的資料執行的處理常式。

span.span: The handler to execute on data from the first source.

param.name: source2
param.span: 第二個來源。

span.span: The second source.

param.name: action2
param.span: 要對第二個來源的資料執行的處理常式。

span.span: The handler to execute on data from the second source.

summary.span: 監視兩個資料流程來源，叫用先提供資料的任一個來源的提供之處理常式。

span.span: Monitors two dataflow sources, invoking the provided handler for whichever source makes data available first.

returns.span: 表示非同步選擇的 。

span.span: A that represents the asynchronous choice.

returns.span: 如果在選擇完成前兩個來源都已完成，則產生的工作將被取消。

span.span: If both sources are completed prior to the choice completing, the resulting task will be canceled.

returns.span: 當其中一個來源有可使用的資料，並成功將它傳播到選擇，則在處理常式完成時，產生的工作會完成，如果處理常式擲回例外狀況，工作會以 狀態結束，並包含未處理的例外狀況。

span.span: When one of the sources has data available and successfully propagates it to the choice, the resulting task will complete when the handler completes; if the handler throws an exception, the task will end in the state and will contain the unhandled exception.

returns.span: 否則，工作會結束，其 設定為 0 或 1，分別代表第一個或第二個來源。

span.span: Otherwise, the task will end with its set to either 0 or 1 to represent the first or second source, respectively.

returns.span: 這個方法會只使用兩個資料來源的其中一個資料來源的項目，永遠不會同時使用兩者。

span.span: This method will only consume an element from one of the two data sources, never both.
The is .

The is .

The is .

span.span: If both sources are completed prior to the choice completing, or if the provided as part of is canceled prior to the choice completing, the resulting task will be canceled.

returns.span: 當其中一個來源有可使用的資料，並成功將它傳播到選擇，則在處理常式完成時，產生的工作會完成，如果處理常式擲回例外狀況，工作會以 狀態結束，並包含未處理的例外狀況。

span.span: When one of the sources has data available and successfully propagates it to the choice, the resulting task will complete when the handler completes; if the handler throws an exception, the task will end in the state and will contain the unhandled exception.

returns.span: 否則，工作會結束，其 設定為 0 或 1，分別代表第一個或第二個來源。

span.span: Otherwise, the task will end with its set to either 0 or 1 to represent the first or second source, respectively.

summary.span: 監視三個資料流程來源，叫用先提供資料的任一個來源的提供之處理常式。

span.span: Monitors three dataflow sources, invoking the provided handler for whichever source makes data available first.

returns.span: 表示非同步選擇的 。

span.span: A that represents the asynchronous choice.

returns.span: 如果在選擇完成前所有來源都已完成，則產生的工作將被取消。

span.span: If all sources are completed prior to the choice completing, the resulting task will be canceled.

returns.span: 當其中一個來源有可使用的資料，並成功將它傳播到選擇，則在處理常式完成時，產生的工作會完成，如果處理常式擲回例外狀況，工作會以 狀態結束，並包含未處理的例外狀況。

span.span: When one of the sources has data available and successfully propagates it to the choice, the resulting task will complete when the handler completes; if the handler throws an exception, the task will end in the state and will contain the unhandled exception.

returns.span: 否則，工作會結束，其 設定為以 0 起始的來源索引。

span.span: Otherwise, the task will end with its set to the 0-based index of the source.

returns.span: 這個方法會只使用其中一個資料來源的項目，永遠不會是多個。

span.span: This method will only consume an element from one of the data sources, never more than one.

Public Function NullTarget(Of TInput) () As ITargetBlock(Of TInput)

typeparam.name: TInput
typeparam.span: 此區塊可以接受的訊息的類型。

span.span: The type of the messages this block can accept.

summary.span: 取得目標區塊，以同步方式接受並置放提供給它的所有訊息。

span.span: Gets a target block that synchronously accepts all messages offered to it and drops them.

<Extension()> Public Function Post(Of TInput) (target As ITargetBlock(Of TInput), item As TInput) As Boolean

typeparam.name: TInput
typeparam.span: 指定目標區塊所接受的資料型別。

span.span: Specifies the type of data accepted by the target block.

param.name: target
param.span: 目標區塊。

span.span: The target block.

param.name: item
param.span: 提供給目標的項目。

span.span: The item being offered to the target.

summary.span: 將項目張貼至 。

span.span: Posts an item to the .

returns.span: 如果目標區塊已接受項目，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the item was accepted by the target block; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一旦決定目標區塊接受或拒絕的項目，但除非否則取決於特殊的語意的目標區塊，它不會等候要實際處理的項目，這個方法會傳回。This method will return once the target block has decided to accept or decline the item, but unless otherwise dictated by special semantics of the target block, it does not wait for the item to actually be processed. 例如， ，將會傳回它已儲存的已張貼的項目到其輸入佇列時)。For example, will return from as soon as it has stored the posted item into its input queue). 從區塊處理的觀點來看`Post`為非同步。From the perspective of the block's processing, `Post` is asynchronous. 提供的訊息，該支援延後的目標區塊或區塊可能會在進行更多的處理其`Post`實作中，請考慮使用，這會立即傳回，並可讓延後的已張貼的訊息目標然後稍後再使用它之後`SendAsync`傳回。For target blocks that support postponing offered messages, or for blocks that may do more processing in their `Post` implementation, consider using , which will return immediately and will enable the target to postpone the posted message and later consume it after `SendAsync` returns.

typeparam.name: TInput
typeparam.span: 指定要發佈至目標的資料的型別。

span.span: Specifies the type of the data to post to the target.

param.name: target
param.span: 要公佈資料的目標。

span.span: The target to which to post the data.

param.name: item
param.span: 提供給目標的項目。

span.span: The item being offered to the target.

summary.span: 非同步提供訊息給目標訊息區，並允許延遲。

span.span: Asynchronously offers a message to the target message block, allowing for postponement.

returns.span: 表示非同步傳送的 。

span.span: A that represents the asynchronous send.

returns.span: 如果在呼叫 期間目標接受並使用所提供的項目，從呼叫返回時，所產生的 將完成，而且其 屬性會傳回 。

span.span: If the target accepts and consumes the offered element during the call to , upon return from the call the resulting will be completed and its property will return .

returns.span: 如果在呼叫期間目標拒絕所提供的項目，從呼叫返回時，所產生的 將完成，而且其 屬性會傳回 。

span.span: If the target declines the offered element during the call, upon return from the call the resulting will be completed and its property will return .

returns.span: 如果目標延後所提供的項目，則會緩衝項目直到目標耗用或釋放項目，此時將會完成工作，而其 指出訊息是否已耗用。

span.span: If the target postpones the offered element, the element will be buffered until such time that the target consumes or releases it, at which point the task will complete, with its indicating whether the message was consumed.

returns.span: 如果目標永遠不會嘗試使用或釋放訊息，則傳回的工作永遠不會完成。

span.span: If the target never attempts to consume or release the message, the returned task will never complete.
The is .

returns.span: 若目標在呼叫 SendAsync 期間接受並使用所提供的項目，產生的 將於目標從呼叫返回時完成，且其 Result 屬性會傳回 true。

span.span: If the target accepts and consumes the offered element during the call to SendAsync, upon return from the call the resulting will be completed and its Result property will return true.

returns.span: 若目標在呼叫期間拒絕所提供的項目，產生的 將於目標從呼叫返回時完成，且其 Result 屬性會傳回 false。

span.span: If the target declines the offered element during the call, upon return from the call the resulting will be completed and its Result property will return false.

returns.span: 若目標延後所提供的項目，會緩衝項目直到目標使用或釋放該項目，此時工作將會完成，而其 Result 會指出訊息是否已使用。

span.span: If the target postpones the offered element, the element will be buffered until such time that the target consumes or releases it, at which point the Task will complete, with its Result indicating whether the message was consumed.

returns.span: 如果目標永遠不會嘗試使用或釋放訊息，則傳回的工作永遠不會完成。

span.span: If the target never attempts to consume or release the message, the returned task will never complete.

returns.span: 如果在目標已成功地耗用傳送的資料之前已要求取消時，傳回的工作會在已取消狀態下完成，而資料將不再用於目標。

span.span: If cancellation is requested before the target has successfully consumed the sent data, the returned task will complete in the Canceled state and the data will no longer be available to the target.

exception.span: 為 null (在 Visual Basic 中為 Nothing)。

span.span: The is null (Nothing in Visual Basic).

MemberSignature.Value: public static bool TryReceive<TOutput> (this System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.IReceivableSourceBlock<TOutput> source, out TOutput item);
.method public static hidebysig bool TryReceive<TOutput>(class System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.IReceivableSourceBlock`1<!!TOutput> source, [out] !!TOutput& item) cil managed
<Extension()> Public Function TryReceive(Of TOutput) (source As IReceivableSourceBlock(Of TOutput), ByRef item As TOutput) As Boolean

typeparam.name: TOutput
typeparam.span: 指定來源所包含的資料型別。

span.span: Specifies the type of data contained in the source.

param.name: source
param.span: 要從其中進行接收的來源。

span.span: The source from which to receive.

param.name: item
param.span: 從來源接收的項目。

span.span: The item received from the source.

summary.span: 嘗試以同步方式從 接收項目。

span.span: Attempts to synchronously receive an item from the .

returns.span: 如果可以接收項目，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if an item could be received; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法不會等到來源有提供項目。This method does not wait until the source has an item to provide. 它會傳回可用的項目。It will return whether or not an element was available.
